thread.title: Sunny Friday ahead of major Christmas week warmup
thread.title_full: Sunny Friday ahead of major Christmas week warmup

author: Justin Stapleton, Daji Aswad, Brittany Begley
title: Sunny Friday ahead of major Christmas week warmup
text:
Recommended Videos
Cool Down Friday: HOUSTON – The dip in temperatures continues for Friday’s high temperatures as well. Most areas are coming shy of 70. While all of this is pleasant, Houston is back to a warming pattern this weekend.
Sunny and pleasant Weekend Warm-Up: Houston will see temperatures jump from the 60s to the 80s. There is a small chance of showers on Sunday. If you are traveling this weekend, you shouldn’t run into too many weather-related travel issues here in Texas. There is a small chance of showers on Sunday.
Warmer Temperatures Your Extended Forecast: This warmth is not temporary! Houston stays above average through Christmas.
Where did winter go? Stay up to date with the latest changes using Storm Tracker 2 radar and regular updates from the KPRC 2 Weather Team on Click2Houston.
